name: 101WikiTo101json
heading: download and convert the content of the 101 wiki into json
comment: This module fetches each pages from the wiki so its execution could take 5 to 20mn

inputs.101worker/configs/wikibot.config.php: configuration related to the 101 wiki settings
inputs.http://101companies.org: mostly all content page of the wiki are read

outputs.101web/dumps/Wiki101Full.json: full dump of the wiki represented in json
